alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otsego, southeastern Broome, northwestern Delaware and southeastern Chenango Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Frankfort to near Norwich to near Great Bend. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Sidney, Walton, Guilford, Sanford, Hartwick, Cooperstown, Edmeston, Westville and Deposit. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 79 and 84. Interstate 88 between 7 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
